channel.title: Comments on: Confessions of a Wanna Be Minimalist
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: By: Helen
item.dc:creator: Helen
item.description: We learned how much we could live without when we were in Switzerland....moving there with very little and having space for even less helps! But it is amazing how quickly STUFF eases back into your life. Living in a small condo helps keep it a little sane. Very excited for you guys...Florida awaits!
item.content:encoded:
We learned how much we could live without when we were in Switzerland….moving there with very little and having space for even less helps! But it is amazing how quickly STUFF eases back into your life. Living in a small condo helps keep it a little sane. Very excited for you guys…Florida awaits!

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Ryan M
item.dc:creator: Ryan M
item.description: Oh do I hear you about the gadgets... I suffer from gadgetlitis. Can never have too many. Sometimes they are the end of me. If they are not working in perfect harmony I must make it so without compromise. It is disruptive.
item.content:encoded:
Oh do I hear you about the gadgets… I suffer from gadgetlitis. Can never have too many. Sometimes they are the end of me. If they are not working in perfect harmony I must make it so without compromise. It is disruptive.

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Ruth
item.dc:creator: Ruth
item.description: Thanks for the great tips! I have so wanted to pare down but haven't gotten around to it. Yesterday I started in the kitchen and each cabinet led to a narnia-like wonderland. The four of you are in my heart and I am SO EXCITED for your wonderful journey. Making it happen, you are! The stuff of legends, you are! Yoda, I am channeling.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the great tips! I have so wanted to pare down but haven’t gotten around to it. Yesterday I started in the kitchen and each cabinet led to a narnia-like wonderland. The four of you are in my heart and I am SO EXCITED for your wonderful journey. Making it happen, you are! The stuff of legends, you are! Yoda, I am channeling.

LikeLiked by 1 person
